scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R build dist && cp claudia/* dist &&  cd dist && sed -i .banana 's%/static/css%/latest/static/css%' build/index.html && sed -i .banana 's%/static/js%/latest/static/js%' build/index.html && sed -i .banana 's%static/media%latest/static/media%' build/static/js/main.*.js && sed -i .banana 's%/static/media%/latest/static/media%' build/static/css/main.*.css && rm build/index.html.banana && echo 'ALL GREEN :)'
